includedAssets.title: Batman Begins
includedAssets.synopsis: A billionaire playboy begins a one-man crusade to clean up Gotham City's streets. Christian Bale stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A billionaire playboy begins a one-man crusade to clean up Gotham City's streets. Christian Bale stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A billionaire playboy begins a one-man crusade to clean up Gotham City's streets. Christian Bale stars.

includedAssets.title: The Dark Knight
includedAssets.synopsis: Christian Bale returns as the Caped Crusader, battling Heath Ledger's Joker on the streets of Gotham. Searing action from Christopher Nolan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Christian Bale returns as the Caped Crusader, battling Heath Ledger's Joker on the streets of Gotham. Searing action from Christopher Nolan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Christian Bale returns as the Caped Crusader, battling Heath Ledger's Joker on the streets of Gotham. Searing action from Christopher Nolan.

includedAssets.title: The Dark Knight Rises
includedAssets.synopsis: Christian Bale's Batman battles Tom Hardy's unstoppable villain Bane in the epic conclusion to Christopher Nolan's trilogy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Christian Bale's Batman battles Tom Hardy's unstoppable villain Bane in the epic conclusion to Christopher Nolan's trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Christian Bale's Batman battles Tom Hardy's unstoppable villain Bane in the epic conclusion to Christopher Nolan's trilogy.

includedAssets.title: The Dark Knight Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Scarred by the murder of his parents and tormented by his lawless city, billionaire Bruce Wayne transforms himself into what Gotham’s criminal underworld will learn to fear the most. Christian Bale is Batman in Christopher Nolan’s critically acclaimed, smash-hit trilogy. Michael Caine, Morgan Freeman, Gary Oldman, Liam Neeson, Aaron Eckhart, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Heath Ledger, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy also star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Christian Bale takes on Gotham’s underworld as the Batman in Christopher Nolan’s critically acclaimed, smash-hit trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scarred by the murder of his parents and tormented by his lawless city, billionaire Bruce Wayne transforms himself into what Gotham’s criminal underworld will learn to fear the most. Christian Bale is Batman in Christopher Nolan’s critically acclaimed, smash-hit trilogy. Michael Caine, Morgan Freeman, Gary Oldman, Liam Neeson, Aaron Eckhart, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Heath Ledger, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy also star.

includedIn.title: The Dark Knight
includedIn.synopsis: Scarred by the murder of his parents and tormented by his lawless city, billionaire Bruce Wayne strikes fear into the heart of Gotham’s criminal underworld as masked vigilante Batman. Ra’s Al Ghul, Scarecrow, Bane and the Joker all battle the bat in this acclaimed trilogy.

Ra’s Al Ghul, Scarecrow, Bane and the Joker all battle the bat in this acclaimed trilogy.
